name.baseName: 直接还原铁生产;直接还原铁;氢基还原（部分）

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Direct Reduced Iron (DRI) production utilizing hydrogen-based reduction (H-DR, part) represents a unit process intended for the manufacturing of iron with reduced carbon footprint. This method is particularly useful for industries requiring iron with specific metallurgical properties, like those in the steel manufacturing sector. It can be applied in processes where a cleaner and more sustainable alternative to the traditional blast furnace method is desired.
使用氢基还原的直接还原铁（DRI）生产（部分）代表了一种用于制造低碳足迹铁的单元过程。这种方法特别适合需要具有特定冶金属性的铁的行业，如钢铁制造行业。在需要清洁和更可持续的传统高炉方法的替代方案的过程中，可以应用这种方法。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The average operating data of Coal-DR, NG-DR (MID), and NG-DR (ENE) demonstration projects in China are used as the benchmark for the LCI of DR routes.

technology.technologicalApplicability: Direct Reduced Iron (DRI) production utilizing hydrogen-based reduction (H-DR, part) represents a unit process intended for the manufacturing of iron with reduced carbon footprint. This method is particularly useful for industries requiring iron with specific metallurgical properties, like those in the steel manufacturing sector. It can be applied in processes where a cleaner and more sustainable alternative to the traditional blast furnace method is desired.
使用氢基还原的直接还原铁（DRI）生产（部分）代表了一种用于制造低碳足迹铁的单元过程。这种方法特别适合需要具有特定冶金属性的铁的行业，如钢铁制造行业。在需要清洁和更可持续的传统高炉方法的替代方案的过程中，可以应用这种方法。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: The carbon reduction potential of hydrogen in the low carbon transition of the iron and steel industry: The case of China
The carbon reduction potential of hydrogen in the low carbon transition of the iron and steel industry: The case of China

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using Life Cycle Inventory (LCI) data of the DRI production process, users should note that the data is benchmarked against the average operating data from Coal-DR, NG-DR (MID), and NG-DR (ENE) demonstration projects in China. For the LCI data of COG-DR and H-DR routes which are not scaled up in China, estimates are based on Coal-DR routes combined with data from simulations, laboratory tests, and process modeling. It’s essential to pay attention to the methodology described in the referenced literature (Table 9, [49,50]) when adopting the LCI data for these routes. Ensure that system boundaries, assumptions, and the specific context of the data are adequately considered in the modeling of the use phase and any environmental impact assessment.

在使用直接还原铁生产过程的生命周期清单（LCI）数据时，用户应注意数据是根据中国煤基还原铁（Coal-DR）、天然气基还原铁（NG-DR（MID）和NG-DR（ENE））示范项目的平均操作数据进行标定的。对于在中国没有放大的COG-DR和H-DR路线的LCI数据，估计是基于Coal-DR路线与模拟、实验室测试和过程建模数据相结合的。在采用这些路线的LCI数据时，需注意文献中所述的方法论（表9，[49,50]）。确保在使用阶段建模和任何环境影响评估中充分考虑到系统边界、假设和数据的特定背景。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
